alert.note: Alert for Chester; Hardeman; Madison; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 3:30PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN HARDEMAN...NORTHWESTERN MCNAIRY...SOUTHEASTERN MADISON AND SOUTHWESTERN CHESTER COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM CST... At 330 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bolivar, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Henderson, Bolivar, Chickasaw State Forest, Chickasaw State Park, Silerton, Masseyville, McNairy, Toone, Hornsby, Finger, Medon, Pinson, Pine Top, Parkburg, Middleburg, Hickory Corners, Deanburg, Teague, Five Points, and Montezuma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for west Tennessee.
